chats.title: Your Chats
chats.emptyDescription: Import a WhatsApp chat to get started
chats.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
chats.clearAllMessage: Remove all chats and insights from your device.

importGuide.title: How to Import
importGuide.subtitle: WhatsApp Chat Export Guide
importGuide.intro: Import your WhatsApp conversation to analyze your relationship dynamics and communication patterns.

steps.step2Description: Enter the chat you want to analyze
steps.step3DescriptionIOS: Tap on the contact or group name at the top of the chat, scroll all the way down and tap "Export Chat"
steps.step3DescriptionAndroid: Tap the three dots (â‹®) and select "More" â†’ "Export Chat"
steps.step4Description: Choose "Without Media" when prompted (media files are not needed for analysis)
steps.step5Description: Select "Bonobo" from the share menu to import the chat

profile.title: My Profile
profile.loginPrompt: Login to sync your data across devices

auth.logoutMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?
auth.deleteAccountMessage: Permanently delete your account and all data. This cannot be undone.
auth.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account and ALL associated data including chats, purchases, and insights. This action CANNOT be undone.
auth.deleteAccountFinalMessage: This is your last chance to cancel. All your data will be permanently deleted.
auth.missingCredentialsMessage: Please enter your email and password
auth.missingPasswordFieldsMessage: Please fill in all password fields
auth.passwordTooShortMessage: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.passwordUpdatedMessage: Your password has been updated successfully
auth.accountDeletedMessage: Your account and all data have been permanently deleted.

paywall.title: Unlock AI Insights
paywall.subtitle: Get deep relationship analysis powered by advanced AI
paywall.secureSubtitle: Create an account to access your insights from any device and keep your purchases safe
paywall.secureSubtitleShort: Create an account to access your insights from any device

privacy.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacy.message: All chat data is stored securely on your device. We never upload your conversations to our servers. AI analysis is performed using encrypted requests.
privacy.dataSecure: Your data is private and secure. We only use your email to help you access your account.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

import.successMessage: Chat between {{participants}} with {{count}} messages has been imported.
import.zipExtractionFailedMessage: Could not extract chat content from the ZIP file. Please try exporting the chat as "Without Media" or use manual import.
import.zipProcessingErrorMessage: An error occurred while processing the ZIP file. Please try again or use manual import.
import.noTextDataMessage: No text data was found in the shared content. Please try exporting the chat again or use manual import.
